I've been thinking this series was plodding along on some sort of boring auto-pilot, but this episode rocked my world. Surprising, shocking, tear-inducing --well done folks!

Thanks! But "Torchwood" (only two members left from third season, sigh...) should really get a grip now. Only five episodes to come and they are as harmless as Hello Kitty. They no longer defy anyone, just watching and getting beaten up. C'mon guys, start kicking some asses!!!
